Text: To be honest, I believe that the people who ran that website pirated these games off of tpb and decided to "profiteer" in their own interests. Can't say I like that so dont get scammed. Unless you really like old M-DOS games dont buy their membership
I'm not going to beg like some other n00b, But can we arrange some kind of "pass the torch" agreement with anyone who is a regular (seeder)
Hi, i have been looking for imperium galactica for years. Could you please seed it again?
Ah, good olde Sim Ant. Time to start the DOS emulator.
